text: Enore Boscolo (; born July 18, 1929) is a retired Italian professional football player. He was born in Udine, and played for 10 seasons (220 games, 53 goals) in the Serie A for U.S. Triestina Calcio, A.C. Torino, A.S. Roma, Lanerossi Vicenza and Calcio Padova. ==External links== *Profile at Almanaccogiallorosso.it Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Udinese Calcio players Category:U.S. Triestina Calcio 1918 players Category:Torino F.C. players Category:A.S. title: Enore Boscolo
